title: Beer and sausage hotpot
ingredients: ['330ml beer', '4 red potatoes, quartered', '1 teaspoon dried Italian herbs', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '225g carrots, peeled and cut into 5cm pieces', '1 onion, chopped', '450g smoked sausage, such as kielbasa, cut into 2cm slices', '1 small cabbage, quartered']
